header.title: Welcome to Artograd
header.subtitle:
The largest community of creators and city residents.
Be the one who changes the world around.

steps.stepTitle1: Tenders for art project are created
steps.stepDescription1: Tenders created to beautify the neighborhood through various art projects, which may span across multiple formats such as murals, installations, sculptural works, landscape art, and more.
steps.stepDescription2: Creators are invited to submit their proposals for art projects based on the tenders released, sharing their concept, expected budget, timeframe, and how their work aims to enhance the neighborhood's aesthetics and culture.
steps.stepTitle3: You vote for submitted art projects proposals
steps.stepDescription3: As a resident, you can vote for submitted art projects proposals considering their potential aesthetic impact and value addition to the community's culture, and the benefits they would bring to the neighborhood.
steps.stepTitle4: Artists and creators start working on the project chosen
steps.stepDescription4: Once the winning proposals are selected, creators and artists begin the implementation process. They bring their artistic vision to life, adhering to the project's budget and timeline, and working towards enhancing the neighborhood's aesthetic and cultural appeal.
steps.stepTitle5: New art project in your city/ location
steps.stepDescription5: A new art project is set to enliven our city. Everyone’s participation is welcomed in enhancing local aesthetics and convenience, and continuously contribute to the enrichment of our cityscape, either by submitting proposals or voting for their favorite projects.
